panel.title: Applications Service Continuity Indicators : Disaster Recovery Tracking for â†’ $Title$

search.query: | savedsearch armada_dr_br_sharepoint_list | dedup Title | table Title

single.title: DR: Disaster recovery / BR: Backup recovery

search.query: | inputlookup armada_list_servers.csv | stats first(status) as Status,first(icon_value) as icon_value,first(color_value) as color_value by Hostname | sort Hostname | eval Range=if(Status="Offline","Elevated","Low") | stats values(Status) as Status | eval Status_Global=if(match(Status,"Offline") ,"ERROR","HEALTHY") | stats values(Status_Global) as Status_Global | appendpipe [stats count | eval Status_Global="HEALTHY"| where count=0 | table Status_Global] | eval Status_Global=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"ERROR", true(), "HEALTHY") | eval color=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"#DD0727", true(), "#008000")

index=sag_database_normal O1P18698DG1 sourcetype="database:oracle:failed_jobs" | stats sum(FAILURE_COUNT) as Failure by INSTANCE_NAME | eval status=if(Failure=0,"success","failed") | fields status | eval Status_Global=if(match(status,"failed"),"ERROR","HEALTHY") | stats values(Status_Global) as Status_Global | appendpipe [stats count | eval Status_Global="HEALTHY"| where count=0 | table Status_Global] | eval Status_Global=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"ERROR", true(), "HEALTHY") | eval color=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"#DD0727", true(), "#008000")

index=sag_common_hpbsm NAME_APPLICATION="armada" AVAILABILITY="0" | stats latest(AVAILABILITY) as AVAILABILITY, latest(RESPONSE_TIME) as RESPONSE_TIME by NAME_APPLICATION, NAME_BTF, NAME_LOCATION,NAME_TRANSACTION | rename NME_BTF as "Business process", NAME_TRANSACTION as "Transaction name" | stats count | eval status=if( count=0, "check","Failed") , color = if( count=0, "#53a051","#dc4e41") | table status | stats values(status) as status | eval Status_Global=if(match(status,"Failed") ,"ERROR","HEALTHY") | stats values(Status_Global) as Status_Global | appendpipe [stats count | eval Status_Global="HEALTHY"| where count=0 | table Status_Global] | eval Status_Global=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"ERROR", true(), "HEALTHY") | eval color=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"#DD0727", true(), "#008000")

| inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv | inputlookup append=true ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv | inputlookup append=true ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | search status!="Closed" AND status!="Resolved" |dedup number | eval Status_Global=if(match(priority,"1") ,"ERROR","HEALTHY") | stats values(Status_Global) as Status_Global | appendpipe [stats count | eval Status_Global="HEALTHY"| where count=0 | table Status_Global] | eval Status_Global=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"ERROR", true(), "HEALTHY") | eval color=case(like(Status_Global,"%ERROR%"),"#DD0727", true(), "#008000")

| inputlookup armada_list_servers.csv | stats first(status) as Status,first(icon_value) as icon_value,first(color_value) as color_value by Hostname | sort Hostname | eval Range=if(Status="Offline","Elevated","Low") | fields Status Hostname Status | eval color=case(Status="Offline" , "#DD0727" , Status="Online" , "#008000" , true(), "#8ad8e5")

index=sag_database_normal O1P18698DG1 sourcetype="database:oracle:failed_jobs" | stats sum(FAILURE_COUNT) as Failure by INSTANCE_NAME | eval Failure_Count=INSTANCE_NAME+" (".Failure.")" | fields Failure_Count | transpose | fields - column | rename "row 1" as Instance1 ,"row 2" as Instance2

index=sag_database_normal sourcetype=*ProcessUsedPct* OR sourcetype=*SessionUsedPct* O1P18698DG1 |timechart span=10m avg(Process_used_PCT) AS "% of process used" avg(Session_PCT) AS "% of active sessions" by INSTANCE_NAME limit=0

index=sag_common_hpbsm NAME_APPLICATION="armada" AVAILABILITY="0" | stats latest(AVAILABILITY) as AVAILABILITY, latest(RESPONSE_TIME) as RESPONSE_TIME by NAME_APPLICATION, NAME_BTF, NAME_LOCATION,NAME_TRANSACTION | rename NME_BTF as "Business process", NAME_TRANSACTION as "Transaction name" | stats count | eval icon=if( count=0, "check","warning") , color = if( count=0, "#53a051","#dc4e41") | table count, icon, color

panel.title: ITSM : Count Of Tickets ( Not Closed Or Not Resolved) By Priority For The Last 3 Month

viz.title: ðŸŽ« Incidents Count For The Last 3 Month

search.query: |inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_INCIDENTS.csv | dedup sys_updated_on,number | search status!="Closed" AND status!="Resolved" | stats dc(number) as count by priority | eval color=case(priority="1" , "#DC4E41" , priority="2" , "#FCCE54" , priority="3" ,"#A267D8" , priority="4" ,"#ACA49E" , priority="5" ,"#6C757D", priority="Total","#87C1FF", true(), "false") , priority = "priority: ".priority

viz.title: ðŸŽ« Change Request Count For The Last 3 Month

search.query: |inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_CHANGE_REQUESTS.csv | dedup number | stats latest(urgency) as urgency, latest(escalation) as escalation, latest(assignment_group_name) as assignment_group_name, latest(opened_at) as opened_at,latest(service_offering) as service_offering , latest(sys_updated_on) as modification_time, latest(short_description) as short_description, latest(status) as status, latest(state) as state , latest(cmdb_ci) as cmdb_ci, latest(priority) as priority , latest(sys_id) as snow_token by number | search status!="Closed" AND status!="Resolved" | eval service_offering="OeBS Pharmacie" | lookup SPLUNK_HOLISTIC_CI sys_id as cmdb_ci outputnew name | stats count by priority | eval color=case(priority="1" , "#DC4E41" , priority="2" , "#FCCE54" , priority="3" ,"#A267D8" , priority="4" ,"#ACA49E" , priority="5" ,"#6C757D", priority="Total","#87C1FF", true(),false ), priority=case(priority="1" , "P 1" , priority="2" , "P 2" , priority="3" ,"P 3" , priority="4" ,"P 4" , true(), "Others")

viz.title: ðŸŽ« Problems Count For The Last 3 Month

search.query: | inputlookup ITSM_ARMADA_HLD_PROBLEMS.csv | dedup number | stats latest(urgency) as urgency, latest(escalation) as escalation, latest(assignment_group_name) as assignment_group_name, latest(opened_at) as opened_at,latest(service_offering) as service_offering , latest(sys_updated_on) as modification_time, latest(short_description) as short_description, latest(status) as status, latest(state) as state , latest(cmdb_ci) as cmdb_ci, latest(priority) as priority , latest(sys_id) as snow_token by number | search status!="Closed" AND status!="Resolved" | eval service_offering="sanetiq" | lookup SPLUNK_HOLISTIC_CI sys_id as cmdb_ci outputnew name| stats count by priority | eval color=case(priority="1" , "#DC4E41" , priority="2" , "#FCCE54" , priority="3" ,"#A267D8" , priority="4" ,"#ACA49E" , priority="5" ,"#6C757D", priority="Total","#87C1FF", true(),false ), priority=case(priority="1" , "P 1" , priority="2" , "P 2" , priority="3" ,"P 3" , priority="4" ,"P 4" , true(), "Others")
